main.java.latexee.declareast

Class MacroDeclaration

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.latexee.declareast.DeclareNode
      • main.java.latexee.declareast.MacroDeclaration

  • public class MacroDeclaration
extends DeclareNode
    MacroDeclaration is a class, which inherits from DeclareNode. MacroDeclaration holds information about user-defined macros, like \declare{macro=\tuple, meaning=ecc.Tuple, argspec=[2], code{#1, \ldots, #2}} Instances of this class hold information about macro's meaning, name and argument count, misc information, content dictionary.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class main.java.latexee.declareast.DeclareNode

        meaning - meaning of the Macro (meaning=ecc.Tuple)

        arguments - number of arguments the macro takes. (argspec=[2])
